body.name: No-Scratch Web Belt with Rubber Coated Tips and Advanced Hook & Loop Fasteners
features: 1 3/8" (35mm) wide heavyweight webbing belt with no buckle, hard plastic or metal parts. Nickel free and Hypoallergenic.
Features unique combined hook & loop fasteners - there is not a hook side and a loop side - both sides are the same fastener material.
Rubber coated on both end tips. Provides protection from dings and scratches.
Fully adjustable for a great fit. Simple fastening method can help users with limited dexterity.
Versatile nonmetallic belts for everyday casual wear, travel, musicians, sportsmen and more.
body.description: Versatile 1 3/8" wide (35mm) heavyweight polypropylene webbing belt, with advanced hook & loop fasteners and unique rubber coating on each end. Easy to use no-scratch hypoallergenic belts have no nickel or metal parts. If waist measurement is between belt sizes, please order the larger size belt. Produced and distributed exclusively by Loopbelt.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #21,843 in Arts, Crafts & Sewing (See Top 100 in Arts, Crafts & Sewing) #110 in Buckles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek, mostly comfortable, solid, streamlined, durable
reviews.reviewText: Yes. It is one of a kind this belt, the ends are nice.The fact that I've been doing it wrong the whole time, I didn't need a fully stretching belt, I needed a solid thin one made of fabric mostly.It supports my pants staying in one fixed position instead of falling down.This is a perfect belt for my job where I will have a tool belt on. Two metal belt buckles slamming against each other with their width and depth sucks, a piece of metal jabbing my stomach all day clanking around.You find yourself avoiding taking it apart half the time to take clothes off so it's cumbersome if so.Although I do place 5 stars for good work, I am myself an inventor and I wish to give a heads up.The belt needs very little, some, give, at either the center (back) or on one or two of the sides preceeding the majority of the velcro, like a rubber material. I would not place spandex or other rubber band or traditional stretching belt. You can't take away the solid feel.I would place just enough to allow pulling toward one side, because this nylon stuff you know, it's extremely stiff. When someone uses a traditional leather whatever belt with a buckle, they have leverage to tighten. This doesn't. You literally have to use all your might to bull the pieces together, and hopefully not snag it on too early or you're re-doing it.I also find that you need extra positioning to snug the upper layer into the pants belt loop, you find yourself needing to shift the entire belt to the left or right then back into its area, unless you don't care.It needs minimal expanding, or it needs a tool to tug it inward. A sliver of rubber that allows the belt to expand in one to 2 places for leverage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great. Adjustable. Perfect.
reviews.reviewText: Looks scratchy, actually fine. A little awkward to tighten but easy when you get the hang of it. Due to the design, in between sizes are not awkward at all. Most importantly: No buckle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2 months in, still works well
reviews.reviewText: have worn this daily for two months. stitching and hook and loop are holding up well.eventually the hook and loop will fail, but it's not hard to replace it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE it, great for sensitive people
reviews.reviewText: I am very sensitive when it comes to belts. This Velcro belt is easy to use with no metal which is great for airports. Does not irritate me at all and holds my pants up nicely. Comfortable and would recommend. Great price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like anything was with velcro its wears out
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable belt doesn't cut into your waist even if you have an active lifestyle. The velcro did wear out after the third month and needed replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Belt fits perfectly. It's nice that you can adjust it exactly how you need it. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible value and does what it's meant to do
reviews.reviewText: This is my third. Owner is a seriously nice guy. When it first came out, I got more of a beta version and he sent me another one for free to replace it because it had flaws and didn't charge me anything. That one is just now falling apart after about 10 years. I use it just about every weekend in the garage and mowing the lawn. Only thing I think they should do is put a second or third stich in the velcro. That's the main issue. the velcro is finally coming off. But I beat it to hell and it took 10 years to wear out. For 8-12 bucks that's incredible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Edit******Please see my original review where I expressed concerns over longevity. 17 days in, the belt has come apart. Like disintegrated. Pics attached.The belt fits true to size.This is so much more comfortable than a buckle digging into your gut.I've only been wearing it a week. The light weight construction makes me wonder about long term durability.This is a light weight belt. If you need to hang anything off your belt, this may not be the best choice.If you need to hold your pants up and stay comfortable, this is the belt for you.
This belt holds firm, and doesn't have a buckle to dig into you. I've worn it every day for a couple months, still works as well as the day I got it. I'll buy another.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente que agrado mucho y me quedo ala perfeccion
That you don't have a sometimes troublesome buckl bothering you.e
reviews.reviewText: I like the way I can adjust it without the need to punch holes in it
I love this belt! The metal on regular belts give a rash so this one is the fantastic having no metal!
